content.detailedDescription: At about 10:30 pm i went out side to watch fire works. i looked up to the west and saw a orange/yellow glow in the sky comming at me from the west heading east at about 1000 to 1500 feet high. it made no sound and as it went over my house it blinked out and then back on then out again. after it went out i could see a disc like shape with kind of a see thru glow around it as it disappered to the east. then a few seconds later another one came over and it did the same thing as the first this happend 4 times within just a few minutes. i called my wife out and she saw 3 of the 4 objects also. when the 4th object went over we saw a small plane above it comming from the southwest to the northeast the plane crossed over the 4th object and it blinked out sooner than the other 3. after it was over we talked about what we saw and both agree that they were not choppers or planes or fire works they seem to have controled movments and made no sounds. over the next couple of nights i saw similar object in the sky but a lot higher up.
content.summary: 4 fireball objects one after another same flight path low in the sky over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard, hanging clothes to dry. then all of the sudden i heard roaring. like a roar from a motor. i looked up and i saw a ufo very close. the distance was about 500 ft at the most.It was shaped like a ball on the top and at the bottom like a metal shaped pyramid. the ball glowed and i saw smoke coming out at the bottom. at first it moved slow and then it picked up speed. it took off very very fast. and then it disappeared. i got scared and i couldn't move.
content.summary: I saw a ufo shaped like big glowing ball with a metal shaped pyramid at the bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
I was upset we were being sprayed again & so decided to take some pics of them to see the deference thickness as a comparison to the beautiful feathery white clouds & than loaded it on the iphoto to see it up close , lol ! in one zoomed in photo a 'rod / cigar' shape can be seen , perhaps they check the chemical compositions being used ? 
the full original pic is nothing much to look at but i'm attaching anyway along with the close up of that craft .
content.summary: Took photos of chemtrails & a cigar shape appeared in a close-up.

content.detailedDescription: I was helping pack up the car from a day of sailing & playing at the marina at okoboji boats. it was definitly dark-  sun had just set. i'm opening the passanger car door when for some reason i looked up at the sky. coming across the very top of the tree line in the residential area which surrounds the marina was a deep, bright orange glowing sphere. i'm guessing about 36-42 inches in diameter perhaps a little larger like the size of a beach ball, for example. i immedialty shouted "look girls a chinese latern". in my brain all i could think was that this was some sort of fireworks toy like the parachutes we shot off as children but i've  never heard of chinese latern fireworks & i don't know why that popped into my head. the only chinese latern reference i know in my world is a blooming plant called a chinese latern that produces little round orange balls. that's the same shape & color as this object in the sky- so i was watching & waiting for something to happen like fireworks. but it just kept floating there in the same place. no sound. i turned around to see where the kids were-  if they too were seeing this but they were exhausted and already in the back seat of the car. i looked back up at the sky and it seemed to be slowly moving up & away from the tree tops moving in a very slow pulsating sort of way, like the way a jelly fish moves through the water. suddenly a man was at my car door and we were both watching the sky again i said "chinese latern" and he looked at me as though i were crazy and repeated with a question "chinese latern???" i replied "i've got 2 kids with me so right now that's a chinese latern" in that brief exchange i took my eyes off the object and again turned around to see the kids were still in car-  their mother had her head in the trunk packing up coolers, toys etc. i couldn't have taken my eyes off it for more than a few seconds then i looked back up at the sky and it was no more than an orange dot- now super far up & away. how could it move that fast, i asked myself. there is no way it could be that far away in 3 or 4 seconds. but it was. i could still see the distinctive orange color but it was so far up at this point it was a mere dot in the sky. the man next to me was gone. i wish i had gotten his name.I never felt scared, just curious. i've always believed that ufo's do exist but have never thought i've seen one. once we left parking lot i knew it was a ufo.
content.summary: Orange glowing ball appeared just over the tree line at okoboji boats marina.

content.detailedDescription: I set up my telescope for the first time to get a close look at the moon. i was doing my adjustments to see the craters i was using 25mm lens(which shows the whole moon). at that moment this space craft ( i call it space craft because i could identify it very easily so it wasnt a ufo) it entered my view and when it reached the middle of my lens, it made a complete u turn banking left and when it turned i could see the whole surface of it very clear. thanks the light that moon was creating i could actually see the whole craft in detail. it was the best seconds of my life that i came to accept the fact that extraterrestrials are here. it was not a satellite. i know the difference between a satellite that enters your lens from right side and crosses at a very high speed and exits your view. this thing was shaped like a boomerang and it was silverish titanium kind of color or material. i could see 3 lines that were dividing the whole craft in 3 pieces. i know what i saw and i dont know if anyone else encountered what i saw and the detail i saw. i consider myself to be one of the luckiest persons alive who actually saw it in detail. i assure you that the craft was below the atmosphere. when i see a satellite on telescope they are just a tiny little black dot travelling at a very high speed. the craft that i saw wasnt travelling more than maybe 200mph. which is very slow for any craft thats in the air. especially when it entered the u turn, it slowed down quite a bit. i think if any aircraft slows that much in our technology it will stall and just fall out of the sky. because we do not have the technology to use to overcome the gravity. but this craft obviously wasnt limited by our gravitation. if you need any more information on this encounter you can contact me anytime.
content.summary: Silver or titanium , 2 or more lights on bottom.

content.detailedDescription: It was december 24th 2008 also known as christmas eve it was around midnight. i remember the date so well because it was when my brothers wife told everyone she was pregnant. while both of our families were at midnight mass in a church in twickenham, london, england. me, my brother and three other relatives were standing outside talking when i looked up at the clear dark sky and in the distance i saw a formation of small white dots close to each over one behind another. first i thought they were just stars then i noticed they were all moving at a fair speed in one direction. there was around 5-8 lights.They were very noticeable because the sky was so clear with no stars or clouds. then i said to my brother look at them lights moving what are they. we stood there for a few minutes looking but we couldn't figure out what they were when suddenly the lights started to vanish starting from the leading white dot going to 2nd and so on until they were all gone. at the time i thought it was weird but i didn't think much of it then as time went on i started seeing these ufo documentaries on tv and in one of the programmes they were talking about ufo sightings and there was this one report of a row of small white lights moving in the dark sky over new mexico that's when i started thinking i saw ufos but i didn't no what to do with this information until now
content.summary: A row of white dots in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My good friend and i were driving n. on the 405 fwy near torrance area passing crenshaw blvd. i was driving, i noticed a bright star like object. it had a white rectangular tail of some sort that seemed to go out of the atmosphere. i am confused by what i saw and have seen it in the area multiple times. in different areas, at different view points. i submitted good photos of what i had seen before. i wish i could have take photos of this.  it starts out looking like a small cloud like object, then almost looks like a needle with slight ovular a loop in the top end. it eventually gains a bright star like point and all together vanishes. if someone else saw this please contact me, i wear glasses, but this i saw clearly multiple times. it was a tiny bit cloudy but did not hinder visibility. i would estimate it was high, but low enough to where driving down the freeway i was able to "swing" around it a tiny bit. i would have to guess it came from the north west towards the south east and then curved up in to space. i am familiar with all sorts of helicopters and aircraft and it was nothing like them. it was not stars, or weather phenomenon either. at one point it looked like the star was the tip of something in our atmosphere. in a since it is almost more bizarre to me than if i had a close encounter. and since i have seen it more than once i feel like its teasing me now. my friend who is educated and knowledgeable like me could not figure out what it was either. i will keep my eye out for it again and try to take more pictures of the phenomenon. i marked partially cloudy, but it was slightly cloudy. it always it overcast heading in towards lax. we were going to fry's electronics.  
-chris
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Driving on 405n fwy with friend, both see starlike object with rectangular? tail.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were caming in the redwoods at a beautiful place on the night of friday i woke to use the restroom and hiked down the path to find a spot i was amazed how it illumiated.  i flashed my flashlight and with outh the illumination changing there seemed to be a beam of light looking back.  i got up and went to my tent where i showed my boyfriend he looked at it and we both stood ther wondering what it could be.  i sat down and saw my boyfriends head yank back he said that beam was looking at him.  there was no moon and it was very dark and so suprising that the light was so bright.  then my boyfriend and i watch the lights dim not move. then my boyfriend watched it shrink and dim them fly though the trees where my boyfrind could no longer see.  we were baffeled.  
it might be useful to tell you i am psychic and so is my daughter who was there.  it would also intrest you in that earier we all did a night walk and photograghed more than a hundred orbs.  i know this sounds nuts but i would e happy to show the pictures.  i didn't get a pic of the bright lights.  but please give us the benefit of the dought and call and we can tell you more.  i later went to were i saw the bright light and it was in a circle of trees that would have been difficult if not impossible to climb on in the dark.  and somehow that spot has intest energy.  i am able to show you were the light exactly and where the orbs were.  i am hoping for a logical explation and need your help.  i was startled but not scared that much and neither was the boyfriend we went right back to bed.  and for the last crazy thing i am going to tell you is that this is not my first enounter.  please please just call and jive me a chance to tell you and answer questions to find out what this was.
content.summary: Freezbe shaped very illuminating white whti plulsating blue that went back and forth and spotlight.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was outside and seen something in the sky that was too bright and not moving like a plane. she called me outside and i looked to the north west at this bright round orange object moving off to the east. it looked as though it moved in a  straight line and when it hit a certain spot to the east it would get dim and disappear.  i was going to call the police but it was gone. i called my mom and brother who live in calumet city, il to tell them. my first reaction was to pamic and run back in but i was captivated and curious as to what it was. as i was telling them, my duaghters noticed it was coming around again. same way. same path. as soon as it hit the same spot to the east it got wouldget dim and disappear. my mom and brother could not see it as it came around again. my mom told me to call my sister who lives south of me in cedar lake, in to see if she could see.  so i am telling her that the moon is south of me and the big dipper is north of the moon. she finds the area and all of a sudden my older daughter says its coming around again. same way. same path. at the same time my sister on the phone gasps and asks what it is. we watched as it followed the same path and diappeared off at the same point on the east.    it did not return and we watched for another 30 min.  i saw it pass about 4- 5 times in total and my sister saw it once.  very strange.  no noise. very bright orange and would get dim and disappear at the same point in the sky. always appeared from the northwest heading to the east. not extremely high in the sky- was above tree top. sky tonight was clear.  still very shocked and curious to see what it was. searched google and seen multiple accounts over chicago and indiana since july 1st about the same time. very bizarre.  was searching for orange lights over northwest indiana for todays date and pulled up the other accounts.  i lost sight of the object over the same eastern point in the sky. after 4- 5 passes it didn't return.
content.summary: Bright orange globe.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on tx 183 just outside of brownwood.  i saw 5 lights.  they were gold in color.  they were in a slight arc and angled at 45 degrees.  the 3rd or 4th light went out and another light appeared at the bottom of the arc.  at first i thought it was a plane, but i quickly saw that they were individual lights.  

i was driving and i pulled over.  the five lights went out.  three lights reappeared in a different spot in the sky.  they went out one by one.  a single light appeared higher in the sky.  i tried to video with my phone, but i have never used it before and could not get it to work in time.

the entire event was 5 minutes or less.  the lights were stationary.  they did not appeat to move.

there were a couple of vehicles that drove by, and i was astonished that they did not stop.

the lights did not flicker.  they just came on and went off like they were on a switch.
content.summary: I saw 5 lights, one would disapear and another appear. then all disapeared and three reappeared further away. then just a single.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not the first encounter, nor the last by all means.  in fact, since november of 2009 i have not only sighted, by estimate, over a thousand of these spheres of all sizes in a single event, but also encounters with beings.  i assume mst is mountain stantard time for the us.  i did check sphere, however the first one may have been rectangular, or a rectangular opening.  previous to this event, i had not noticed any ufo's; i did have encounters with invisible beings displaying mass, intelligence, and a good grip on american english.  up to the november event, i assumed i was in a technology test area for invisibilty, and i assumed the invisibles were humans in suits just dicking with me.  way too much to write about here, so i will move on to the november 2009 event.

please understand i have been reluctant to tell this to very many folks for good reason; the whole sequence of events for the last two years has made me quite sure i do not understand as much about the physical and spiritual creation as i thought i did. 


to begin, the event is a 3 day sequence.  tuesday the 17th around 9:30pm i stepped out the back door to have a cigarette.  i had just lit it and was looking to the west when i saw a large emerald green meteor streak across the sky from nnw headed ssw and appeared to land in southeastern utah or northeastern arizona.  while i was still in the wow mode, i glanced to the south and spotted two human looking beings in dark suits with what looked like helmets on, walking next to the woods about 50 feet away.  they stopped when i said, "cool tech. you ought to share it with me".  they hustled off like they were surprised i saw them.  the next morning there was one mention on the early news about the meteor.

the next night, the 18th, i stepped out about 9:30pm to have a cigarette when a little girl with long blonde hair, in a light dress, no coat, and no shoes came skipping up the sidewalk toward me with a little blonde boy in short pants, no coat, and no shoes running behind her, and a man at the end of the sidewalk by the shed just standing.  the sidewalk is about 50 feet long.  the temperature was in the high 30's f and there was patchy snow on the ground. the little girl and the little boy came right up to me and they both smiled and the little girl waved, or i realized later was pointing up.  neither one said a thing when i asked where their coats and shoes were and if they needed help.  the little girl did wave at me then, turned around and skipped back down the sidewalk with the little boy right behind her.  they stopped by the man and i asked again if i could help them and no one answered.  i crushed my smoke and stepped in the house and locked the door and sat down.  i was kinda weirded out for about three minutes before my concience took over and i decided they were vagrants and i ought to give them food and clothing and maybe lodging until i found out more.  i put my coat back on, went outside, walked down to the end of the sidewalk where they still were standing, but the man had moved off about 20 feet.  i asked them again if they needed help, but they shook their heads in a side to side 'no' motion and kept trying to sign to me.  they obviously weren't deaf, but they would not or could not speak to me, while they kept motioning and signing trying to get me to understand something.  the man just stood off motionless and silent. i don't how long this went on while they would look questioningly at each other, then go through another round of motions and signs while i made numerous wrong verbal guesses.  i was pretty sure they had to be freezing their buns off by this time because i had thermal underwear and a heavy coat on, and i was getting chilly.  finally the little girl looked really frustrated, kinda leaned back with arms out, and palms up motioning with a ta da, here it is, will you look up you bonehead, look!  i did finally to see a rectangular opening closing on a huge craft that took up most of the sky just before clouds enveloped it then disappeared.  the sky and the stars took on a way different look than i had ever seen.  the little girl, the little boy, and the man remained, and the little girl seemed to be the one most responsible for communicating with me.  the only time the man made any move was when i pulled out my cell phone for more light to see what the little kids were trying to communicate me and the little girl kinda startled for a moment before she realized i wasn't a threat.  things got really weird from this point forward.  i began to reason how to do a valid reality check on myself if i had slipped into cartoonland madness.  i knew my fingers, toes, and nose were getting cold.  i was more afraid of madness, than anything that was happening.  in fact, i reasoned that this episode was making alot of sense even though it was exceeding anything i had ever heard of happening, or even imagined as far as what might be possible in this realm of existance.  continuing: they got so tired of asking about their physical comfort and the cold, different kinds of clothes appeared on them and they seemed to getting impatient with me.  did say getting weirder?  three more little kids began appearing and disappearing while they morphed into animals i had never seen.  they got me to realize they wanted me to lay on my back on the sidewalk and watch the sky.  when i did all disappeared but the man, and he changed position while keeping his distance.  at this point, spheres began appearing from near orion and getting larger and larger as some would stop right above me, then take off in varied directions, some disappearing as they went, some changing color and pattern schemes, but still spheres, while others positioned themselves like sentries.  i watched this for i don't know how long(i quit counting after 300), but i knew i was getting hypothermic and had to go in and get warm.  it was almost 1:00am by this time.  the event doesn't end here, and the next day was equally unexpected, but i have things i have to do right now.  i will relate more if folks are genuinely interested.  i have hundreds of still photos also.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 main beings and 4 more less definite. at least several hundred spheres displaying different lighting and invisibility.

content.detailedDescription:
Taken from email i sent to friends: 

[link moved to additional evidence section]

hi all-

in addition to the above stories, on july 4th, while riding my bike home from a friend's between 11:30/ 12am, i noticed some interesting lights in the sky. about 8 or so glowing, orangish, same -sized, very slow moving orbs almost hanging in the south/ southeast sky. i glanced over and saw other folks, in their yards and such, looking up at the lights too, so i pulled over and asked a few what they thought. the majority of responses hadn't a clue, but most had been watching for at least 10 minutes. i finished my ride home and hurriedly ushered my housemate, rob, outside to get a glimpse before they disappeared. a  few were still 'hanging out', shimmering a bit, moving behind clouds and such, while the rest seemed to either vanish or simply move out of visual range. i stupidly remembered i had a camera in my bag, and quickly grabbed it to attempt some lame video footage (it looks ok, but nothing spectacular-- the best part about it was rob saying 'that's definitely some x-files ****'). we both pretty much wrote the experience off to '4th of july' antics by whomever-- maybe huge flares attached to weather balloons, or possibly even some type of military experiment/ or hoax? 

anyhow, the next day i decided to check out the local newspapers-- nothing, of course. upon scanning the internet, though, i quickly came across multiple stories of sightings from around the area-- including most of oregon and into washington. hmmm. a few days later, still no 'mainstream' news action, yet to my surprise many many more stories on the web from around the entire country-- same type of sightings described almost exactly, and around the exact same time of night (timezone differences not withstanding)! there are even reports from ontario and other parts of canada... crazy, right? further research shows that these sightings have continued to at least july 8th, and now this wild story about the chinese airport shutting down due to 'ufo' activity (including cool video footage), it really makes one wonder, no? just what is going on.... 

anyone else out there see anything besides the fireworks?
content.summary: 8-10, maybe more, spherical-shaped equi-distant pale yellow objects almost hovering in south/southeast sky until moving out of range (disappearing?)

content.detailedDescription: Invisible shadow like creature ghost like  they are the blue star things people see moving tey turn off lights when they approach they look like flying reptile i took photos while they circled me they got incredibly close 3 nights in a row i wanted proof so got a camera and took pics
content.summary: Invisible space creature caught on my camera 4 times.

content.detailedDescription: We were walking to my stepsons condo on outskirts of boulder, my friend and i both looked up at what we thought was a shooting star,but was barely moving when we saw it. you could make out shape of cigar by the orange ( harvest moon color) light that glowed from right 1/3 of ufo. we were looking east.  it appeared to move very slowly then darted upward and disappeared. i have been very obsessed with the night sky at home in washington after seeing this. i go over it in my mind and can find no rational answer to what we saw. i just wish i had had a camera.
content.summary: Large cigar shaped in sky about one third was lit up glowing orange, moving very slowly then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Spentthe eveing with family members setting off fireworks.  i joined family members in the front yard watching the children.  i had a green laser which i used to point out stars when star gazing.  i was flashing at the star vega, when i seen a series of flashes.  i thought it may have been a response, i was surprized and shouted, "what the heck."  other members asked me what was wrong and i told them i had seen flashes and pointed out where they eminated from.  the flashes continued in a sequence of three flashes and occurred three complete times.  two adult family members witness the flashes after i pointed them out.  they appeared to be orange in color and very distant, not aircraft lights or a satillite, these flashes did not appear to move aganist the background star field.  thay appeared roughly overhead at the time, and i live in a remote area, so fireworks or other man-made sources are not likley.  i was amazed to what i had witness and don't have any idea what these flashes may have been, but i continue to watch the sky in the same area.
content.summary: Viewed flashes in the sky, appeared similar to a beacon.

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pictures of the sunset after a rainfall. was standing in my front yard.  upon examining film, disc shape shows in one photo but not in the previous or next slide taken within the same 60 seconds. 5:30pm on 5/24/10.  attached in 2nd photo is a close up.  using the street lights as a frame of reference, the object appears quite large.  the street lights are located approx 3/4 of a mile from me.  it is not the moon or a star as those would have appeared in every photo.
content.summary: Disc shape seen on film not by naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
About 1:00 am give or take did not note time at on-set i was sitting on couch and at some point i noticed a sort of hum best to describe as follows take an old ceramic or glass jug blow across but not quite right as the note has not been struck just the slight low resonance below - before as you are searching to get the note it was pulsating oscillating in intensity not very loud not really distant i could not identify the noise and attributed to one of the kids'es tv on carton nw events dictated that i needed to go in to the hall about 45 min. later and the noise was still prevalent but the intensity was much less the oscillation appeared un-changed at this point i asked mt daughter whom was awake not feeling well said to me "what is that sound" i went afoot outside to look as it was not inside and tuned in a location west slightly south in a tree line west of a field behind the house to the west i noticed almost at ground level some lights went in and grabbed my field glasses and n/v vid and noticed on ground behind trees before a slight berm an blueish orb moving around at slight above ground level 5-6 foot and a thin black what appeared a bar - line about 12-18 ft long 2-3 ft high thin rectangle with light glowing underneath (reddish-orangeish) observed for a while then i shined a strong light at the direction and immediately the orb  shot straight up slightly to west and light returned on rectangle and it went slowly up and i could see bottom and it was in reality a chevron shape three light bluish white and then a red one came on in middle of bottom it maneuvered a bit and just went up following orb off in the horizon very very quickly looked like stars in about 1-1/2 min. noise gone not the first time this year seeing orbs around here like march was my first ever here or since 94 and 96 for every report i sent there is one or so that i just didnt.
  these orbs are really strange why so many in the past year more than ever
if all or 1/3 of the sightings real then what is this what are these, i thing there needs to be much! more invested into these orbs sightings or what ever.
 me
  ps. the ir n/v video was all awash with bright light eventhough there wasnt much light impossible to see or record.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Chevron - orb mild sort of a hum oscillating.

content.detailedDescription: my experience started when i was hanging out with one of my friends at his apartment in tewksbury ma.  one late night around 1:30 in the morning a star like object, star like in the type of blinking, non-constant light that it emitted, began to rise above the treeline you can see from his porch.  it was ignorable until the movements did not match any known planes or helicopters that i am used to seeing on a regular basis.  it rose, in scale, about one inch in the sky, about 6 inches to the right, back down an inch, rising to the left about an inch up and 6 inches out.  that light made enough of an impression on me that for the next few weeks, i kept my eyes to the sky.  this one night, back at my house in billerica, ma, i was again awake at around 12:30 1 am, and i noticed a similar light in almost the same position in the sky.  i thought considering how bright it was that it was potentially a star or even venus, but after watching the amount of progress this object made moving across the sky while the other stars in the area were stationary, i was sure this was the same object.  i watched it for at least 2 hours just cruising at a relatively low elevation.  during those two hours, a red blinking light accompanied its airspace, coming from the south east sky, moving to the northeast then north part of the sky, and then it would go bak where it came into sight.  it would repeat this several times over the course of the night, while the main bright light just continued to hover slowly over the general area.  after noticing those two objects faithfully for a week at the same times of night, i decided to call my friend in tewksbury, "pete", and after describing what part of the sky to look, i told him about this light.  giving him the description of the object and its placement in the sky, he told me, "that's exactly where the light i always see is."  right when he recognized the object i was talking about, the power on my street began to go out, starting at one end of the road and blackening all the way to where i was.  at the moment that my power went out, a bright white flased seemed to bring on the darkness.  instatnly i had chills from head to toe and i told my friend, "jeff" i was with to drive to petes.  driving there, i kept my eye on the still stationary light in its position in the sky.  after turning on to 129 in billerica, the object began to accelerate and decelerate at an amazing speed, almost as if it were chasing us.  its elevation was relatively low as it continued chasing me, until i got to petes apartment.  by the time i got there, pete was asleep, and the light was floating high above the parking lot.  after i decided to go home, i again looked at the light, which for the rest of the night stayed there and never left.  that was at 3:30 in the morning.  that was the only hair-raising experience this object has given me, but writing this in late july, 2010, the object is still there faithfully, every clear night.  this after multiple other sightings/experiences at my house makes 6 events that i have yet come to a definite conclusion as to what happened, all happening at my house, not just my road, but my property.  i feel this object needs to be reported, as it is one of the only times an object is faithfully in the same sky every night.  thanks for listening.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Beginning in june i have noticed this light every clear night above my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping in my bed, and i thought i had been lying there for hours but come to find out after, it was actually only 1:30am. anyways, i'm having a normal dream, which i can remember. all of a sudden, in the dream, there was a really loud repetitive pounding drumming. it took me a while to notice it, but when i did i thought 'this isn't right, this doesnt make sense in my dream'. so it is at this point that i wake up (or so i think). the drumming is coming from only one side of the room, the side with the door, so i turn my head to look. i don't see anything so i turn my head back toward my window on the opposite wall. i'm definitely awake at this point, and i no longer hear the drumming. when i look at my window i see a flash of blue light. my blinds are closed, but the light is bright enough that i can see through them, and i can see something floating in the sky outside my window. the object looks like a thick dark line with a haze around it. it goes dark again, but now there's a shadowy figure/shape drifting into my room from the window. it is getting closer and closer to me, and i am starting to panic, but i can't move because it feels like something is pushing on my back. i felt pinned to my bed. it gets close enough that i can touch it, and finally i'm able to pick up a pillow and swat at it. it then just dissipates into nothing.

at first i felt confused by the drumming, and then i felt terrified by the moving figure. i'm not sure what this was, but i have never experienced anything like this before.
content.summary: I woke up in the night, saw a flash of blue light and saw a shape in the sky outside my window.

content.detailedDescription:
I laid on my bed in my private room in the house from my parents and watched a documentation about a cruiseship in tv. my window after me was open, because it was mild outside (around 20c). then i heard a sound of a thunder and thought that i must save my plants, which they stands on the terrace. because a thunder can be follow with stormy winds and that one can damage plants. i went with worrys about my plants outside my room and something stopped me at the window in the hallway at first floor. 

i didnt why but i have the feeling that something guided me to this window and i must look out. then i must strech me too see the discs. the disc on the right side above sparkled. faster than a second but constant. more right was the moon covered with a cloud and it was fullmoon. on the right side from the moon was the thundercloud, i heard the thunder at the begin from there, with violet color and teard edge. the discs was clear with no covered cloud as the moon and i could see no stars. and the approximately destination from these objects was south-east and the thunder came from south-west. i think that the distance from my observationplace and these objects was not more than 500 meter and they was bigger than the moon. 

i was a little shocked, because i didnt expect to see something and standing at the window. then i went back to my room an tried to see the discs from another window in these destination and i thought thats are a firework in the first time. i was excited and run back to the window where i see the object at the first time to make sure that are they be still there. it was so. then i run to the terrace for my plants. i ran back to this window, they was still there again. and i remembered me that i must make a photo from these objects, also i run to the livingroom where are the camera. i take this and went back (yes i ran again) to the window, but the discs are not more still there, also the moon and the thunder. 

the discs was at time of observation at the same place and doesnt move and must thought at the whole time at the objects. after this i went back to my room and i had fear. my mom ask me to open the door for our cat if she want to come in but i didnt it because my fear. the only thing what i have done outside from room are use the bath at the opposite from my room. i thought thats could be that aliens are coming. 

and at the next day i realy recognize what happend in the last night. i nearly screaming if i saw a spaceship in the tv (watched a star trek episode at this day). i like star trek but i had fear for the enterprise at this day.
content.summary: Observation of four orange discs

content.detailedDescription: We were looking up at the crescent moon between the mandalay bay and the hotel buildings.  i decided to take a picture because of the blue background with the carolina moon and palms.  i took the shot then saw this shape. at first i thought i had a smudge on the lense but it was clean. then i thought it looks like a black angel or a ufo.  as i held the camera we watched it pass across the camera screen at about a jog pace. we kept looking up at the sky and down to the screen.  it was on the digital screen but not in the sky. the object continued to move until it moved out of range of my camera.  we were so taken off guard that we should have taken more pictures but were too busy trying to figure out what was going on.
content.summary: Showed up on camera screen but not by naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on debordieu beach near georgetown, sc, at around 9 p.M. on july 19, 2010.  i stopped to look at the ocean and to my right over the water at about the level a small plane would fly, i saw two sets of very bright, rectangular shaped yellow-orange lights which appeared, blinking on in a sequence of three two times.  the first time they blinked on, the two sets were next to each other, separated by a space about equal to how big they appeared.  then there was a 1-2 second gap, and then the lights appeared again, blinking on in a sequence, but this time separated by a space about three times as big as before.  then they blinked off, leaving an empty sky.  the whole sighting lasted about 5 or 6 seconds.  i saw two people down the beach and walked over to them to see if they had seen the same thing.  they had and were excited and mystified, as i was.  i watched for another 30 minutes or so and walked back to the house.  i told my brother and sister-in-law about the lights.  they told me they had seen them too from our deck overlooking the ocean.
content.summary: Two sets of three rectangular bright yellow-orange lights that blinked on in a sequence twice then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside my patio with my girlfriend when i looked up and saw an object flying across the night sky. it was silent and moving the same speed as a jet. i live nearby edwards afb and plant 42 in palmdale. i'm used to seeing military craft flying all the time but this object did not look like anything i've seen before. it made no noise and the entire body was illuminated. at first i thought it might have been a bird gliding but i cant think of any birds that glow at night. it flew northeat towards edwards afb. it faded off in the distance. it looked the size of a fighter jet. it was too small and way too quiet to be the b-2. i saw it as a triangular object but my girlfriend said it looked like a boomerang.
content.summary: Silent triangular/boomerang shaped aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife margarett  was driving hwy 99 freeway we merged on to i-80 towards reno nv as i start to merge to the left i see out of the corner of my eyes to my left a very shiny silver cigar shaped flying craft it appeared appox 100 to 125 ft long i could not believe my eyes, i was so surprised to see this object flying  across the freeway, at first i thought it was a airplane but it did not have any wings nor a wing tail, at that time i yelled to my wife who was on my cell phone talking to our account in elk grove ca, i told her to look up and i pointed to it she only saw it for a split second it was flying too low to be a commerical airliner or too large to be a private jet ,it was moving left to right at a very fast rate of speed but slow enough to see it clearly it did not appear to have any windows nor did it have any decals or markings on it as soon as it passed over the freeway it made a very sharp left towards the reno area and was gone in less than two seconds i hope someone else saw this today i have never seen any thing like this in my life and i would not make a false claim i do believe now we are not alone, im a god fearing family man with 3 kids who now think im crazy thank you for your time if you wish to contact me please do .
content.summary: Driving down hwy i-80 towards reno i saw what looked like a very large silver cigar shaped craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was scanning the west texas land in leona ranch for hunting properties to purchase when i came upon this weird object in the imagery. the latitude is 29.505872 degrees. the longitude is -100.334474 degrees. it is a bright white circular light. very intense. it measures about 26 feet in diameter. it has a pinkish hue around the white light that turns to neon blueish color. the diameter of the blue glow is measured as approximately 60 feet. it appears to be over a patch of trees. when i zoom in as much as possible, i cannot see through the light. i thought it might be reflection off of a parabolic reflector or something, but there is a house about 500 feet away and if they were to place a reflector, there seems to be plenty of open space closer to the house and not in the trees.  it is a spooky looking image.  what the hell is that!!!!???? this image is there for everyone to see, but i bet it will disappear soon.. it is the strangest thing i have seen in years of examining satellite photos on google.... someone let me know what they think!!  i don't know how to attach the image, but if you go to brackettville, texas and then, go to the lat and long i have given, you will find it. super weird, man!
content.summary: This object or light was spotted on a google earth image taken on 3/31/08

content.detailedDescription: After noticing what looked like a flash bulb (approx 6 flashes over ten minutes) style star anomoly in the western sky on saturday night, i returned to our deck sunday evening around 11pm to chat with my wife and gaze in the same general direction between venus and the moon. after a few minutes i noticed what i always think to be just a run of the mill satellite dot moving perhaps 25 degrees above the moon on a slow path that would take it on a trajectory just above venus. after a minute or so it became too dim to follow (when it was about halfway between the moon and venus). so i essentially lost interest and went back to my conversation with my wife. when all of the sudden, slightly to the left of where i lost sight of this "satellite," an extremely bright white light much like a distant flashlight with gathering intensity and size (almost like it was pointing at us from space) gained illumination for about five seconds before dimming gradually and generally moving toward venus until it dimmed completely out of sight near the location where the original "satellite" type dot vanished completely. i actually wasn't even going to post this, but i noticed the nearby sighting in iowa(250 miles?) that had shockingly similar characteristics as our sightings and occured this weekend in the same western sky (i think). though the iowa sighting seemed to have a longer intense light duration than my strange observances this weekend. i will be out again tonight 7-19-10 looking west to the same location to see what pops up and will report any findings here.
content.summary: Ultra intense white light star drifting and dimming in the western sky

content.detailedDescription: We were at a 4th of july party, watching fireworks outside. i went with my sister and nephew. there were about 20 of us and we all seen these weird objects that looked like: orange oval w/ flame coming from bottom. at first we thought they were planes or maybe someone was playing a tricks with something but there were too many of them. and they came over mtn (montage mtn) across the city of scranton then disappeared.  plus they were very slow. i also have some pictures of the objects. my nephew is 13 yrs old and he is interested in giving his opinion on this matter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange oval

content.detailedDescription:
November 2009, i was invited by a canadian television network for an interview about ufo and a close encounter i had with a spacecraft (look a the picture).

i explained that the phenomena was real, many country disclosure  some of their files on ufo.  credible witnesses such as astronaut, pilots, military staff, also reported ufo. the uk minister of defence put their files online and the french space agency cnes published the cometa report about ufo.

there's overwhelming evidences that's we are not alone in the universe, and there's very advanced technologies.  a former canadian defense minister says be believes advanced technology from extraterrestrial civilizations offers the best hope to "save our planet" from the perils of climate change.

i talked about the close encounter with a ufo... very silent, very bright white light, no pollution.

this ufo was chased by a jetfighter.

i understand that the military staff are monitoring closely ufos... it's their job to check out what's going on in our air space. 
but
the uk minister of defence shut down the ufo line because after 50 years they concluded that ufo wasn't a threat to national security.

so why don't we open our mind to the possibility of a huge jump of consciousness?

what would be the world if we get contact with those spacecrafts, extraterrestrials and technologies?

a world with almost no pollution, health care of everyone, food for everyone, clean water....

a sane growing economy, because we can recycle all the waste, so more and more consumers.... (message to big  company,  big oil company dont worry youll make juste more and more money! (we still need oil to make a lot of products))

i think, as a society, we should take the first step to make official contact with extraterrestrials and forces of light.

there's here... there's real... 

and it can mean a better world for all of us... if we have the right peaceful  relationship with those visitors....
content.summary: Interview with a canadian television network (ufo).

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room when i got the fweoing to liik out the window. i noticed a bright white light in the sky. it appeared to stay in place. i grabbed my sont cybershot dsc-w210 and went outside on my balcony. the object was just above the treeline and stayed in place. i started taking pictures and videos on all the posible settings and zoom. the camera revealed that it had lights not visible to the naked eye.It showed red,blue,green,yellow,white,and sometines orange.In almost every photo it showed that the bottom was a solid blue and the top was either a solid red or solid yellow. it had blinking red,blue,green,yelloe lights on it(not the top/botom lights). the object made no noise. if it was a plane or chopper,i would have heard a noise as i have full hearing. the object was at first at an altitude of 500-2000 feet(est.) and appeared to be slowly gaining altitude. it was moving in a strange pattern. it went fast for 1 second,then hovered, then sped up,then hovered,and so on. it's longest perod of mvement was about 3 seconds and longest hover period was 40 minutes. it moved at a speed of maybe 0-100km/h(est.). there were planes and helicoptgers pasing by ib the area and in the footage.They showed faa lights. this object didn't.It was a clear sky and later had those very thin and small clouds.The object was heading in a east-to-west direction in the path of pearson int. airport.There are 2-3 airports near me. there is a fire station 5 minutes from my home.There are power lines and a rail-road not far from me. the object performed rapid accelerations and 90 degree turns. it even perfirmed a 130degree turn(est.).I don't know if anyone else saw it. no agencies contacted me.In the end the object disapeared behing my building still moving the same way i described it.It was 5-10 times bigger than a star and at least 20 times smaller than the mon. it was as bright,if not brighter than the moon. it may be the size of a house, or bigger(est.). i took about 114 photos and 17 videos all with different settings and sizes. some have motion blur but idon't have a tripod(yet). i felt nothing,smelled nothing,heard nothing. only saw it. i had full health before,during,and after the sighting. the winf was blowing north i think, and theobject moved west. not  baloon.I saw no outline. i even have a short daytime footage of it long after all the stars are gone.Please email me so i can send these 131 files to you.



i first saw it at 12:45 am and last saw it on 5:40 am.
content.summary: Bright white light with red, blue, green, yellow, orange lights visible only to the camera.

content.detailedDescription: They have grouped like constellation ursa, after they regrouped to a vertical row then flew off, 4 object hanging in the air, on the horizon flew 2 more brightly shining object, and then they went away, one after the pair remained one object, which flew quickly into the distance.
content.summary: They have grouped like constellation ursa.
